title: Afghan Refugee Attacks Woman Invited to Read Bible at Migrant Camp
text:
However, she injured her ear when she fell backwards as a result of the attack, reported the U.K. Daily Mail . 
The attack took place in Timelkam in Voecklamarkt, in northwestern Austria. 
The woman had reportedly been invited to discuss the Bible at the camp by Christians who happened to be staying there.   
The Local reported that the man told police he overreacted because he was suffering from “personal problems.” 
Authorities took the man into custody, and he was taken to Wels Prison in Upper Austria. It was not immediately known if the man had been charged with any crime. 
This woman was lucky she wasn’t seriously injured in this attack, because it seemed like the man had every intention of hurting her, as male Muslim refugees have been known to do with women at their mercy. 
The fact that this refugee used personal problems as an excuse for attacking the woman does not make it OK.
